name: NSPersistentHistoryChangeRequest
desc: A request to fetch or purge persistent history.

items.name: var fetchRequest: NSFetchRequest<NSFetchRequestResult>?
items.desc: The specified fetch request, when retrieving history.

items.name: var resultType: NSPersistentHistoryResultType
items.desc: The type of result that this request returns.

items.name: var token: NSPersistentHistoryToken?
items.desc: The specified token, when retrieving history defined by a token.

items.name: class func fetchHistory(after: Date) -> Self
items.desc: Retrieves history since a given date.

items.name: class func fetchHistory(after: NSPersistentHistoryToken?) -> Self
items.desc: Retrieves the request history after a given token.

items.name: class func fetchHistory(after: NSPersistentHistoryTransaction?) -> Self
items.desc: Retrieves history since a given transaction.

items.name: class func fetchHistory(withFetch: NSFetchRequest<NSFetchRequestResult>) -> Self
items.desc: Retrieves history based on a fetch request.

items.name: class func deleteHistory(before: Date) -> Self
items.desc: Purges history older than a given date.

items.name: class func deleteHistory(before: NSPersistentHistoryToken?) -> Self
items.desc: Purges history older than that defined by a given token.

items.name: class func deleteHistory(before: NSPersistentHistoryTransaction?) -> Self
items.desc: Purges history older than a given transaction.
